metadata.title: Instant Pot Easy Tomato Sambar
metadata.description:
Tomato Sambar made in the Instant Pot. Sambar is a popular South Indian vegetarian dish served with dosa, idli and rice. In this recipe, I've used tomatoes and toor dal. True sambar is made with mixed veggies and lentil.

Recipe: http://www.thasneen.com/cooking/instant-pot-easy-tomato-sambar/

transcription: [00:00.000] Prep time 10 mins, Cook time 25 mins, Total time 35 mins
[00:10.000] Author: Thasneen, Recipe type: Main, Cuisine: Indian
[00:20.000] Ingredients for homemade Sambar Masala: Chana dal 2 tbsp, Coriander seeds 1 tbsp, Cumin seeds 1 tsp, Whole black peppercorns 1 tsp, Dried red chilies 3
[00:40.000] Place a pan over medium heat, add chana dal and sauté for 1 minute
[00:50.000] Add coriander seeds, cumin seeds, peppercorns and dried chilies. Roast till aromatic and light brown. Keep aside
[01:10.000] Grind roasted spices to a coarse powder. Store in airtight container if needed
[01:30.000] Soak 2-inch tamarind slice in ¼ cup lukewarm water for 5 minutes. Extract juice and strain
[01:50.000] Rinse 1 cup toor dal and add to Instant Pot with 1½ cups water
[02:10.000] Close lid, select Pressure mode, high pressure, 3 minutes. Quick release after cooking
[02:40.000] Cancel pressure mode, select sauté mode. Add ⅛ tsp turmeric and 3 chopped tomatoes. Mix well
[03:00.000] Add ½ cup water and cook till tomatoes soften
[03:20.000] Add 2 tbsp prepared sambar masala, cook for 1 minute
[03:40.000] Add tamarind juice, cook for 1 minute
[04:00.000] Add 2 pinches asafoetida and chopped cilantro. Cook for 1 minute
[04:20.000] Remove inner pot and keep aside
[04:30.000] Prepare tempering: heat 1 tbsp oil, add 1 tsp mustard seeds, let splutter
[04:50.000] Add 2 dried red chilies and 1 sprig curry leaves, sauté briefly
[05:10.000] Pour tempering over cooked sambar, cover and let sit for a while
[05:30.000] Sambar can be served with dosa, idli, rice, chapati etc.
[05:50.000] Notes: You can add mixed vegetables like carrots, potatoes, okra, eggplant, drumstick along with toor dal
[06:10.000] Sambar masala can be prepared ahead and stored in airtight container for months
[06:30.000] Enjoy your Instant Pot Easy Tomato Sambar!
